comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Calla Lundström Curman (1850-1935)--writer, editor, feminist, conservationist, wife of Carl Peter Curman (1833-1913), photographer and professor; their son Jon Sigurd Curman (in the photo above) was an architectural historian: sv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Calla_Curman sv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_Peter_Curman sv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jon_Sigurd_Curman
